import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faShield, faArrowRight } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const SatisfactionGuaranteed = () => { return (
{/* Left side content */}
Our Promise

Satisfaction Guaranteed

We stand behind the quality of every meal we serve. If you're not completely satisfied with your order, we'll make it right - no questions asked.

  • Premium quality ingredients in every meal

  • Fresh preparation on the day of delivery

  • Rigorous quality control processes

Learn more about our guarantee
{/* Right side - Green section with percentage */}
100%
Money-back Guarantee

Over 90% of our trial customers continue their subscription after experiencing our quality service.

{/* Featured In Logos */}

As Featured In

); }; export default SatisfactionGuaranteed;
